sdAddUKEntryDocumentGuidanceText: This is the last document used for the product to enter the UK. It could be a catch certificate, processing statement or storage document.
sdAddNonUKEntryDocumentGuidanceText: This is the last document used for the product to enter the UK. It could be a 3rd country catch certificate, processing statement or storage document.
sdAddUKEntryDocumentNotificationMsgParag: Provide details of when, where and how the product entered the UK
Provide details of the last document used for the product to enter the UK, this may be a catch certificate, processing statement or storage document
sdAddUKEntryDocumentUKDocumentNumberHint: Only enter one document number including any hyphens/dashes and other characters. For example GBR-2024-CC-BEFCD6036
sdAddUKEntryDocumentNonUKDocumentNumberH: Only enter one document number including any hyphens/dashes and other characters. This could be a 3rd country catch certificate, processing statement or storage document.
sdAddUKEntryDocumentPortLabel: Port where product entered the UK
sdAddUKEntryDocumentTransportHint: For example, the name of a container ship, flight number or vehicle registration.
sdAddProductToConsignmentDateOfUnloading: Date stored must be today or in the past
sdAddProductToConsignmentTransportDetail: Transport details must not exceed 60 characters
sdAddProductToConsignmentWeightOnCCError: Document number must not exceed 52 characters
sdAddProductToConsignmentPortErrorMustNo: Port where product entered the UK must not exceed 50 characters
sdAddProductToConsignmentCertificateNumb: Document number must only contain letters, numbers, forward slashes, back slashes, spaces, full stops, and hyphens
sdAddProductToConsignmentTransportDetail: Transport details must only contain letters, numbers, hyphens, spaces, forward & back slashes, commas and colons
sdAddProductToConsignmentPlaceOfUnloadin: Place product enters the UK must only contain letters, spaces, apostrophes, hyphens, parentheses, forward and back slashes, commas, semicolons, and ampersands
sdAddUkEntryDocumentWeightOnCcHint: Total weight on document for the selected commodity code in kg
sdAddProductToConsignmentPlaceOfUnloadin: Enter the place product entered the UK
